Key Match Events: Reece Topley took four for 49 on his World Cup debut
Sam Curran took two wickets in quick succession to bowl Taskin twice in as many balls
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and resilience
Shakib Al Hasan acknowledged England's strong start and their ability to chase big totals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in unusual style, with Taskin bowled twice in as many balls by Sam Curran
